oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ḥāshiyat Qarah Kamāl ʻalá Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah : manuscript, undated, v. 4
Ḥāshiyah-ʼi Qarah Kamāl, v. 4
Ḥāshiyah ʻalā Sharḥ al-Wiqāyah, v. 4
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Qarah Kamāl.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, from 17 to 23 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
According to the colophon (v. 5, f. 330v) copy completed in the hand of ʻAlī ibn Walī al-Kardawwī (?).

On f. 1r, various ownership statements: al-Sayyid Muḥammad Ghānim ibn Muṣṭafá Ṣafāʼī al-Rashīd ibn Aḥmad Fayḍī ibn Muḥammad ʻAṭāʼī al-Muftī Khurasānīʻzādah, Muṣṭafá al-Muftī ... Khurasānīʻzādah and Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Qāḍī, Maghnīsā [Manisa, Turkey].
Vol. 1 is missing leaves at the end.
MS Arab 262. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
